Scripts.OnLoad: self:RegisterEvent("ADDON_LOADED"); self:RegisterEvent("CHAT_MSG_LOOT"); self:RegisterEvent("LOOT_OPENED") self:RegisterEvent("PLAYER_ENTERING_WORLD"); self:RegisterEvent("CHAT_MSG_COMBAT_XP_GAIN") self:RegisterEvent("CHAT_MSG_COMBAT_HONOR_GAIN") self:RegisterEvent("COMBAT_LOG_EVENT_UNFILTERED") self:RegisterEvent("CHAT_MSG_CURRENCY") self:RegisterEvent("CHAT_MSG_MONEY") self:RegisterEvent("CHAT_MSG_SKILL") self:RegisterEvent("UNIT_SPELLCAST_SENT") self:RegisterEvent("CHAT_MSG_COMBAT_FACTION_CHANGE") self:RegisterEvent("CHAT_MSG_OPENING") self:RegisterEvent("PLAYER_LOGOUT") self:RegisterEvent("UPDATE_INSTANCE_INFO")
